# Weekly Review

Structured reflection at the end of each week.

## When to Use

- Friday afternoon or Sunday evening
- Duration: 30-45 minutes
- Before Monday planning

## Location

```
Operations/Periodic Notes/Weekly/YYYY-Www.md
```

## Procedure

### 1. Gather (5 min)

Collect data from:
- Daily logs from the week
- Calendar (what happened vs planned)
- Completed tasks

### 2. Review (10 min)

Ask:
- What got done?
- What didn't get done? Why?
- What patterns do I see?

### 3. Learn (10 min)

Identify:
- What worked well?
- What drained energy?
- What would I do differently?

### 4. Plan (10 min)

Set up next week:
- 3-5 commitments (Next section)
- Block focus time
- Move incomplete items

### 5. Close (5 min)

- Update weekly note
- Clear mental cache
- Rest

## Output

Updated weekly note with:
- Next: 3-5 commitments
- Wins: what went well
- History: embedded daily entries
